";s:12:"installation";s:904:"<h4>From within dashboard (recommended)</h4>
<ol>
<li>Navigate to <code>Dashboard</code> ▸ <code>Plugins</code> ▸ <code>Add New</code>;</li>
<li>Search for <code>Shortcodes Ultimate</code>;</li>
<li>Click <code>Install</code>, then <code>Activate</code>.</li>
</ol>
<p><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6xhplrZJD9c" rel="nofollow">Watch video of the process</a>.</p>
<h4>Manual installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Download the plugin as a .zip file;</li>
<li>Unzip downloaded archive and upload <code>shortcodes-ultimate</code> folder under your <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory (resulted plugin path should be <code>/wp-content/plugins/shortcodes-ultimate/**</code>);</li>
<li>Navigate to <code>Dashboard</code> ▸ <code>Plugins</code> and activate the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<p><a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/plugin-installation/" rel="nofollow">Detailed installation guide</a>.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:2749:"
<h4>How this plugin works</h4>
<p>
<p><a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/how-shortcodes-ultimate-plugin-works/" rel="nofollow">How Shortcodes Ultimate plugin works</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Shortcodes do not work. Why?</h4>
<p>
<p>The most common reasons of this issue are listed <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/shortcodes-do-not-work/" rel="nofollow">here</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Insert shortcode button do not work. Why?</h4>
<p>
<p>The most common reasons of this issue are listed <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/insert-shortcode-button-do-not-work/" rel="nofollow">here</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Can I remove default shortcodes?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can remove default shortcodes using &#8216;su/data/shortcodes&#8217; filter. Tutorial: <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/disabling-built-in-shortcodes/" rel="nofollow">How to remove default shortcodes</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Can I create custom shortcodes?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can create custom shortcodes using &#8216;su/data/shortcodes&#8217; filter. Tutorial: <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/registering-custom-shortcodes/" rel="nofollow">How to add custom shortcodes</a>.<br />
Alternatively, you can use <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/add-ons/shortcode-creator/" rel="nofollow">Shortcode Creator add-on</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Can I use shortcodes in template files?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes! <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/using-shortcodes-in-template-files/" rel="nofollow">How to use shortcodes in template files</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Will this plugin work with my theme?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes! Shortcodes Ultimate is designed to work with any theme, but your theme must include very basic things: &#8216;wp_head&#8217; and &#8216;wp_footer&#8217; template tags. Sometimes, the plugin may not work properly because of javascript errors caused by third-party plugins/themes.</p>
</p>
<h4>Where can I report a bug?</h4>
<p>
<p>You should <a href="https://github.com/gndev/shortcodes-ultimate/" rel="nofollow">create an issue at GitHub</a> or <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/contact/" rel="nofollow">open new support ticket</a> (for premium add-ons only).</p>
</p>
<h4>Where to find additional information?</h4>
<p>
<p>Plugin has comprehensive <a href="http://getshortcodes.com/docs/" rel="nofollow">documentation</a>.<br />
Also, you can find more answers at <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/support/" rel="nofollow">support page</a>.</p>
</p>
<h4>Where can I get support or talk to other users?</h4>
<p>
<p>If you get stuck, you can ask for help in <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate">official plugin forum</a>.<br />
For help with premium add-ons, please <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/contact/" rel="nofollow">open new support ticket</a>.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:35513:"<h4>5.6.1</h4>
<p><strong>What&#8217;s new</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Comments in the <code>[su_posts]</code> shortcode can now be disabled from post editing screen or, using the Disable Comments plugin. Thanks to <a href="https://github.com/vanokhin/shortcodes-ultimate/pull/98" rel="nofollow">Jörn Lund</a>.</li>
<li><code>[su_image_carousel]</code> will now display post titles instead of image captions, where applicable. <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/display-image-captions-instead-of-post-titles-in-the-image-carousel-shortcode/" rel="nofollow">Details &amp; How to disable it</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed <code>Warning: A non-numeric value encountered</code> in <code>[su_slider]</code>, <code>[su_carousel]</code>, and <code>[su_custom_gallery]</code></li>
<li>Fixed <code>download</code> attribute of the <code>[su_button]</code> shortcode</li>
<li>Fixed issue with <code>[su_spoiler]</code> where nested <code>[su_youtube]</code> remains clickable if spoiler is closed</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.6.0</h4>
<p><strong>What&#8217;s new</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Shortcodes can now be enabled not only in Category descriptions, but in any Term description. See <code>Enable shortcodes in</code> option at plugin settings page</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed WP-Rocket compatibility issue, <code>[su_image_carousel]</code> didn&#8217;t work on Android Chrome. <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/issues-with-wp-rocket-2/">Forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed issue with <code>&lt;span&gt;</code> tags in the <code>[su_tabs]</code> shortcode. <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/element-on-next-line-on-mobiles/">Forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed issue with ghost-style button colors</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.5.0</h4>
<p><strong>What&#8217;s new</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>New option <code>outline</code> for <code>[su_image_carousel]</code> which allows disabling carousel outline (when it gets focus)</li>
<li>New option <code>mobile</code> for <code>[su_tabs]</code> which allows disabling tab stacking on mobile devices</li>
<li>New option <code>texttrack</code> for <code>[su_vimeo]</code> which allows enabling video subtitles</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Improvements</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><code>[su_youtube_advanced]</code> is now always served through https</li>
<li><code>[su_image_carousel]</code>: improved compatibility with various themes</li>
<li><code>[su_image_carousel]</code>: the gallery can now be loaded through AJAX</li>
<li><code>[su_image_carousel]</code>: improved keyboard navigation</li>
<li>Insert Shortcode window will now remain open if the dark background clicked</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed <code>[su_image_carousel]</code> issue with empty image captions (with whitespace)</li>
<li>Fixed <code>[su_image_carousel]</code> issue where images weren&#8217;t shown when crop is disabled</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.4.1</h4>
<p>This update fix various issues related to version 5.4.0</p>
<h4>5.4.0</h4>
<p><strong>What&#8217;s new</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>New shortcode <code>[su_image_carousel]</code> which will take place of <code>[su_slider]</code> and <code>[su_carousel]</code> in the future</li>
<li>New attribute <code>download</code> for the <code>[su_button]</code> shortcode (allows immediate downloading of specified URL in a button)</li>
<li>New attribute <code>id</code> for the <code>[su_heading]</code> shortcode (allows linking to a heading)</li>
<li>New attribute <code>wrapper</code> for the <code>[su_dummy_text]</code> shortcode (allows disabling of the div wrapper)</li>
<li>New attribute <code>mobile</code> for the <code>[su_lightbox]</code> shortcode (allows disabling lightbox on mobile devices)</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Improvements</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><em>Custom CSS code</em> field now has syntax highlighting</li>
<li><code>[su_button]</code> with <code>target=blank</code> will now be displayed with <code>rel='noopener noreferrer</code></li>
<li>Slightly improved appearance of the <em>Available shortcodes</em> screen</li>
<li><em>Vertical tabs</em> are now aligned with CSS flexbox, not JS</li>
<li>Added <code>shortcodes.full.css</code> file to reference the default shortcode styles</li>
<li>Minor improvements to <code>[su_table]</code>, <code>[su_row]</code>, and <code>[su_column]</code> shortcodes</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed issue with <code>[su_lightbox]</code> on iOS</li>
<li>Removed <code>!important</code> from column styles for mobile devices</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Security</strong></p>
<ul>
<li><code>[su_posts]</code> and <code>[su_template]</code> are now allow only templates from active theme or plugin folders</li>
<li><em>Error messages</em> are now displayed only to allowed users (user must have required capability)</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.3.0</h4>
<p><strong>What&#8217;s new</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>New shortcode <code>[su_csv_table]</code> for displaying CSV tables</li>
<li>New option <code>indent</code> for the <code>[su_list]</code> shortcode, which allows adjusting of list indentation</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed inaccessible fields in media modal (while inserting Gallery/Slider/Carousel shortcodes)</li>
<li>Fixed close icon class name in the presets menu</li>
<li>Fixed issue with unwanted content inside single shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed warning when non-numeric value is used for the button size attribute</li>
<li>Min-width for responsive tables is set to 100%</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.2.0</h4>
<p><strong>Improvements</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Tabs and accordions/spoilers are now accessible from keyboard</li>
<li>Tabs are now working better with nested sliders/carousels</li>
<li>Improved stability of some responsive elements, such as Google Maps</li>
<li>YouTube and YouTube Advanced settings descriptions are now more clear</li>
<li>New setting <code>Required user capability</code> which allows enabling the <code>Insert Shortcode</code> button for non-admin users</li>
<li>New setting <code>Enable shortcodes in</code> which allows enabling shortcodes in text widgets and category descriptions</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>youtube_advanced showinfo parameter is deprecated and removed from the plugin. <a href="https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters#release_notes_08_23_2018" rel="nofollow">Why?</a></li>
<li>Font Awesome replaced with <a href="https://github.com/ForkAwesome/Fork-Awesome" rel="nofollow">Fork Awesome</a>. Font Awesome stylesheet (v 4.7.0) will be completely removed in the next update. All icons are now use CSS class <code>sui</code> instead of <code>fa</code></li>
</ul>
<h4>5.1.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Gutenberg compatibility enabled by default</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.1.0</h4>
<p><strong>What&#8217;s new</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Added compatibility with the Gutenberg editor. <a href="https://vanokhin.com/su-now-supports-gutenberg/" rel="nofollow">Learn more</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed <code>&lt;img&gt;</code> icon appearance of the <code>[su_service]</code> shortcode</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.8</h4>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed Live Preview, wasn&#8217;t representing changed settings</li>
<li>Fixed <code>[su_siblings]</code>, now it works again at top-level pages</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Other</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Various code improvements</li>
<li>New filters for gallery, slider, and carousel</li>
<li>Returned <code>su_cmpt()</code> and <code>su_compatibility_mode_prefix()</code> utils</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.7</h4>
<p><strong>Security update</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed shortcode generator preview vulnerability. <a href="https://www.pluginvulnerabilities.com/2018/09/25/full-disclosure-of-vulnerability-in-wordpress-plugin-with-700000-active-installations/" rel="nofollow">Description</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.6</h4>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Added missing images for <code>su_audio</code>, <code>su_video</code>, <code>su_slider</code> and <code>su_carousel</code></li>
<li>Fixed Fatal error: Call to a member function get_page_permastruct() on null in link-template.php:357</li>
<li>Added missing <code>su_get_icon()</code> utility function</li>
<li>Added missing <code>su_scattr()</code> utility function</li>
<li>Added missing <code>su_do_shortcode()</code> utility function</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.5</h4>
<p><strong>Improvements</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improved compatibility with fitvid.js;</li>
<li>Improved appearance of the <code>Show more</code> and <code>Show less</code> links of the <code>su_expand</code> shortcode;</li>
<li>The new option <code>mute</code> for <code>su_youtube</code> and <code>su_youtube_advanced</code> shortcodes;</li>
<li>Support for the <code>youtube-nocookie.com</code> domain in <code>su_youtube</code> and <code>su_youtube_advanced</code> shortcodes;</li>
<li>Support for nested shortcodes in the <code>title</code> attribute of the <code>su_button</code> shortcode;</li>
<li>The new option <code>dnt</code> (do not track) for the <code>su_vimeo</code> shortcode, <a href="https://help.vimeo.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001494447-Using-Player-Parameters" rel="nofollow">learn more</a>;</li>
<li>The new option <code>mute</code> for the <code>su_vimeo</code> shortcode;</li>
<li>https support for the <code>su_dailymotion</code> shortcode;</li>
<li>New options <code>title</code> and <code>rel</code> for the <code>su_permalink</code> shortcode;</li>
<li>The <code>su_post</code> shortcode now support slugs in the <code>post_id</code> attribute;</li>
<li>The new option <code>zoom</code> for <code>su_gmap</code>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Shortcodes styles merged into a single stylesheet.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixes</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed warning in <code>su_siblings</code> shortcode.</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.4</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: added missing FontAwesome icons</li>
<li>Fixed: is_plugin_active call removed on frontend</li>
<li>Fixed: nested shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with spoiler loaded through ajax</li>
<li>Fixed: [scheduler] shortcode logic</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Inview.js library replaced with <a href="https://github.com/protonet/jquery.inview" rel="nofollow">jQuery.Inview</a></li>
<li>Fixed: caching issue with [su_dummy_text]</li>
<li>Fixed: PHP warning in [su_posts] shortcode when specified template does not exist</li>
<li>Updated: Font Awesome to version 4.7.0</li>
<li>Added: responsive styles for [su_pullquote]</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: an issue where RTL stylesheet won&#8217;t displayed if custom CSS field is empty</li>
<li>Fixed: icon sizes at &#8216;Dashboard &#8211; Available Shortcodes&#8217; page</li>
<li>Fixed: [expand] shortcode now works when loaded through AJAX</li>
<li>Fixed: border-radius on [box] shortcode</li>
<li>Fixed: compatibility with &#8216;Plugin Organizer&#8217;</li>
<li>Updated: OwlCarousel jQuery plugin</li>
<li>Added: new attribute &#8216;responsive&#8217; for table shortcode: [su_table responsive=&#8221;no|yes&#8221;]</li>
<li>Added: new attribute &#8216;playsinline&#8217; for youtube_advanced shortcode: [su_youtube_advanced playsinline=&#8221;no|yes&#8221;]</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: serious security vulnerability, which allows attacker to run any code using filter in meta, post, or user shortcodes. Thanks to Robert L Mathews.</li>
<li>Fixed: changed admin menu position (it was replacing &#8216;Settings&#8217; menu on some installations)</li>
<li>Fixed: shortcodes prefix field now accepts special characters</li>
<li>Fixed: old bug when unwanted code parts was added with shortcode</li>
<li>Fixed: bug, where backslashes were removed from custom CSS code</li>
<li>Added: new attribute &#8216;ID&#8217; for [button] shortcode</li>
<li>Added: new filter &#8216;su/slides_query&#8217;, which can be used to modify posts query for slider, carousel and custom_gallery shortcodes</li>
<li>Added: new filter &#8216;su/assets/custom_css/template&#8217; to filter custom css output</li>
<li>Minor fixes</li>
</ul>
<h4>5.0.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>Read <a href="https://vanokhin.com/whats-new-in-shortcodes-ultimate-5/" rel="nofollow">this blog post</a> to learn more about update</li>
<li>New project website <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/" rel="nofollow">getshortcodes.com</a></li>
<li>New documentation <a href="https://getshortcodes.com/docs/" rel="nofollow">getshortcodes.com/docs</a></li>
<li>Added: &#8216;Available shortcodes&#8217; admin menu</li>
<li>Removed: &#8216;Examples&#8217; admin menu</li>
<li>Removed: &#8216;Cheatsheet&#8217; admin menu</li>
<li>Fixed: [feed] shortcode (now it uses SimplePie)</li>
<li>Changed default content for [tabs], [row] and [accordion] shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed: [user] shortcode works when user is not logged in</li>
<li>Changed: Security improvement. Plugin will now strip all HTML tags from Custom CSS code</li>
<li>Minor improvements and fixes</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.10.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Improved: compatibility with PHP7 ([user] and [post] shortcodes)</li>
<li>Fixed: [slider] and [custom_gallery] markup (skipped whitespaces among link attributes)</li>
<li>Removed: user capability check in [permalink]</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.10.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: lightbox javascript</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.10.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: security vulnerability at &#8216;Examples&#8217; admin page (insecure call of file_get_contents() at inc/core/tools.php:774)</li>
<li>Fixed: added access check to permalink shortcode. <a href="https://github.com/gndev/shortcodes-ultimate/pull/20" rel="nofollow">Pull request #20</a>.</li>
<li>Added: PHP7 compatibility. Checked with <a href="https://github.com/sstalle/php7cc" rel="nofollow">php7cc</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/php-compatibility-checker/">PHP Compatibility Checker</a>. <a href="https://github.com/gndev/shortcodes-ultimate/pull/45" rel="nofollow">Pull request #45</a>.</li>
<li>Added: https support for Google Maps. <a href="https://github.com/gndev/shortcodes-ultimate/pull/40" rel="nofollow">Pull request #40</a>.</li>
<li>Added: https support for Youtube. <a href="https://github.com/gndev/shortcodes-ultimate/pull/39" rel="nofollow">Pull request #39</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.9</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: vote popup at plugins page</li>
<li>Minor improvements, fixes</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.8.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: compatibility with WordPress 4.3+</li>
<li>Added: lightbox captions for slider, carousel and custom_gallery. Commit by <a href="https://github.com/vpistis" rel="nofollow">Valentino Pistis</a></li>
<li>Changed: text domain from &#8216;su&#8217; to &#8216;shortcodes-ultimate&#8217;</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.8</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Spanish translation</li>
<li>Updated: Font Awesome updated to 4.4.0</li>
<li>Fixed: buttons line-height on narrow screens</li>
<li>Fixed: nested spoilers</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.7</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: [document] is now compatible with https</li>
<li>Fixed: carousel items width calculation</li>
<li>Added: new attribute for [button title=&#8221;&#8221;], <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/how-add-title-tag-to-a-button">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: stripslashes for [button] content</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.6</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Quick fix for disabled custom css since previous update</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.5</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: basic RTL support</li>
<li>Fixed: JS error (blocking shortcodes settings) on WordPress 3.5</li>
<li>Fixed: minor improvement for slider/gallery posts query. <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/slider-code-suggestion">Forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: minor imrovements on [quote], fixed markup bug for long values in cite, thanks to <a href="http://systemo.biz/" rel="nofollow">Anatoly Yumashev</a></li>
<li>Added: completely redesigned search feature. Now it&#8217;s like a Google, but for shortcodes =)</li>
<li>Added: Insert shortcode popup window hotkey. So now, you can open Insert shortcode window, choose shortcode and insert it with just one click</li>
<li>Updated: new demo video at plugin settings page (About tab)</li>
<li>Updated: new plugin&#8217;s banner and icon</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.4</h4>
<ul>
<li>Updated: Japanese translation</li>
<li>Updated: Polish translation</li>
<li>Fixed: minor fixes in shortcode settings window</li>
<li>Fixed: vulnerability in Examples preview. Added wp_nonce check. Thanks to <a href="http://security.szurek.pl/" rel="nofollow">Kacper Szurek</a></li>
<li>Fixed: vulnerability at Custom CSS page. Added wp_nonce check. Thanks to <a href="https://planetzuda.com/" rel="nofollow">Ryan Satterfield</a></li>
<li>Removed: skins directory creation</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>Updated: owl-carousel.js</li>
<li>Added: minor UI improvements</li>
<li>Fixed: <!-- vimeo error: not a vimeo video --> ssl issue (thanks to Adam)</li>
<li>Fixed: multiple errors on cheatsheet page</li>
<li>Fixed: errors when updating user profile, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/error-message-when-updating-users-in-wp-admin">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Removed: global skin option at settings page</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: minor improvements for tabs/spoilers anchors (auto-removing extra # characters)</li>
<li>Added: compatibility with TablePress&#8217;s advanced editor</li>
<li>Added: new option for tabs. You can now link any tab to any webpage [su_tab url=&#8221;http://&#8221; target=&#8221;blank&#8221;]</li>
<li>Added: new option wmode for [youtube_advanced], <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/youtube-player-option-request">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Added: new shortcode [lightbox_content]</li>
<li>Fixed: lightbox and galleries scripts, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/carousel-su-little-hack">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: removed global function $.support.transition, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/transition-check-returns-string-instead-of-object">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Updated: Russian language</li>
<li>Updated: Japanese language</li>
<li>Updated: FontAwesome, 4.1.0</li>
<li>Updated: Magnific Popup, 0.9.9</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: New shortcode [scheduler]</li>
<li>Added: New shortcode [expand]</li>
<li>Added: New options for [divider]</li>
<li>Added: New option <code>rel</code> for [button]</li>
<li>Fixed: animations script has been changed. CSS animations will be skipped in non-supported browsers, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/disable-animations-on-non-supported-devicesbrowsers">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: templates/default-loop.php &#8211; removed extra n character in comments number, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/minor-bug-in-templatesdefault-loopphp">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: large DB query on sites with many users, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/installing-sc-ultimate-on-site-with-30000-wp-users">forum topic</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>4.9.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>New shortcode [qrcode] allows you to generate colorful and responsive QR codes!</li>
<li>Improved shortcode search. Just type shortcode name and hit Enter</li>
<li>Updated Animate.css (animations library)</li>
<li>Updated ACE editor (custom CSS editor)</li>
<li>Responsive CSS for [tabs]</li>
<li>Highly decreased plugin size</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.8</h4>
<ul>
<li>Minor UI fixes (compatibility with page builders)</li>
<li>Czech translation by <a href="http://nuze.cz/" rel="nofollow">Punc00</a></li>
<li>Added: full compatibility with multiple editors on same page &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/enhance-compatibility-with-other-plugins">fourm topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: extra CSS class for [menu] &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/extra-css-class-not-working-on-menu-shortcode-video-included">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: Swiper click event, Swiper has been updated &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/carousel-links-not-working">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed: [spoiler]&#8217;s content is now hidden until the page is loaded</li>
<li>New dashboard page: Cheatsheet</li>
<li>Minor [spoiler] fix, for hidden spoiler content</li>
<li>Updated Japanese translation</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.7</h4>
<ul>
<li>Long-awaited feature: slider, carousel and custom_gallery links can now be open with lightbox</li>
<li>Long-awaited feature: custom links in slider, carousel and custom_gallery shortcodes</li>
<li>Fixed https bug in FontAwesome enqueue</li>
<li>Fixed bug with multiple users queries &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/plugin-making-700-sql-calls">forum topic</a></li>
<li>New Ghost style for [button]</li>
<li>Minor UI fixes (for WP 3.9+)</li>
<li>New shortcode [dailymotion]</li>
<li>YouTube (advanced) can now use https protocol</li>
<li>Additional help notes in Shortcode Generator</li>
<li>Slovak language</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.6</h4>
<ul>
<li>Auto-save for shortcodes settings. Now you don&#8217;t need to adjust it again and again</li>
<li>New premium add-on &#8211; <a href="http://gndev.info/shortcodes-ultimate/extra/" rel="nofollow">Extra Shortcodes</a></li>
<li>Minor UX improvements</li>
<li>New locale &#8211; VI</li>
<li>Fixed bug with tax_term IDs in [posts] shortcode, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/posts-tax_term-category-number">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed bug with service title, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/service-shortcode-not-wrapping-properly-on-mobile-browser">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Fixed bug with animations names in shortcode generator, <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/animations-2">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Updated settings pages capabilities</li>
<li>Added some hooks</li>
<li>Updated .pot file</li>
<li>Font-Awesome is now loaded from bootstrap CDN. <a href="http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20032426/fontawesome-doesnt-display-in-firefox" rel="nofollow">Technical details</a>.</li>
<li>New review &#8211; <a href="http://wisdmlabs.com/blog/how-to-style-wordpress-themes-with-shortcodes-ultimate/" rel="nofollow">Shortcodes Ultimate: Ultimatize your written content</a></li>
<li>New review &#8211; <a href="http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/add-40-new-layout-features-wordpress-shortcodes-ultimate/" rel="nofollow">Add 40+ New Layout Features To WordPress with Shortcodes Ultimate</a></li>
<li>New review &#8211; <a href="http://thewpchick.com/show-shortcode/" rel="nofollow">Show Me the Shortcode</a> + Video</li>
<li>Updated readme.txt</li>
<li>Compatibility with recent version of <a href="siteorigin.com/page-builder/" rel="nofollow">SiteOrigin page builder</a> &#8211; it&#8217;s free!</li>
<li>Compatibility with recent version of <a href="http://vc.wpbakery.com/" rel="nofollow">Visual Composer</a></li>
<li>Compatibility with recent version of <a href="http://www.elegantthemes.com/gallery/elegant-builder/" rel="nofollow">Elegant Themes page builder</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>4.5</h4>
<ul>
<li>Updated some examples</li>
<li>Removed import functions. Old versions of plugin (like 3.9.5) is not supported anymore</li>
<li>Updated custom formatting filter</li>
<li>Updated Japanese translation</li>
<li>Added NL translation</li>
<li>Minor fixes</li>
<li>Presets. Now you need to adjust the shortcodes only once</li>
<li>New WP filters for shortcodes attributes</li>

<li>Compatibility mode is now enabled by default</li>
<li>Font-awesome updated to 4.0.3</li>

<li>Minor UX improvements</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>IMPORTANT</strong>: new galleries mechanism. Your created galleries will work but will not be visible in admin panel. Now, you&#8217;re able to create galleries right in &#8220;Insert shortcode&#8221; window. Also, you can now create galleries from posts, categories or even custom taxonomies.</li>
<li>Removed all default links (default youtube videos)</li>
<li>Updated admin page framework Sunrise</li>
<li>Minor admin panel fixes</li>
<li>Fixed file_get_contents() (disabled http wrappers) issue at the examples page</li>
<li>Added classes Shortcodes_Ultimate_Generator, Shortcodes_Ultimate_Shortcodes and Shortcodes_Ultimate_Data</li>
<li>Removed unused classes MediaUpload and ImageMeta</li>
<li>New shortocde [dummy_image]</li>
<li>New shortocde [dummy_text]</li>
<li>New shortocde [animate]</li>
<li>New shortocde [youtube_advanced]</li>
<li>New admin page &#8211; Examples</li>
<li>New admin page &#8211; Add-ons</li>
<li>Font Awesome updated to version 4</li>
<li>New attr [spoiler icon=&#8221;&#8221;]</li>
<li>Fixed issue with date format in [posts]</li>
<li>New slider control for shortcode generator</li>
<li>Small fixes</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>New text-shadow picker for [button]</li>

<h4>4.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Font Awesome icons (in Generator)</li>
<li>Fixed warning in footer &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/bug-showing-in-online-site-after-updating-the-plugin">forum topic</a></li>

<li>Removed another warning (undefined index) &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/undefined-index-with-wp_debug-true">forum topic</a></li>
<li>Changed syntax for shortcodes inside of attributes &#8211; <a href="http://gndev.info/kb/how-to-use-another-shortcodes-inside-of-attributes/" rel="nofollow">documentation</a></li>
<li>Small performance improvemets</li>
<li>Aded font-awesome.css. Will be completely included in closest versions</li>
<li>Added default taxonomy value for [posts]</li>
<li>Added default post_type value for [posts]</li>
<li>Added ability to use shortcodes inside of attributes</li>
<li>Translated into Japanese</li>
<li>Fixed [button wide=yes]</li>
<li>Fixed media query for [column]</li>
<li>Added new attr [column center=yes]</li>
<li>Improved js code for spoilers and tabs</li>
<li>Improved js code for generator</li>
<li>Added pot file</li>

<li>Updated Greek translation</li>
<li>Fixed [lightbox]</li>
<li>Disabled wp_footer check</li>
<li>Fixed wp_footer notice, again</li>
<li>Small fix for tooltips</li>
<li>Fixed wp_footer notice</li>
<li>Greek translation</li>
<li>Added compatibility mode prefix for spoilers inside of accordion</li>
<li>Updated qTip plugin</li>
<li>Added shortcode [tooltip]</li>
<li>Added new attribute. [tab disabled=&#8221;yes&#8221;]. Now, any tab can be disabled. <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/tabs-how-to-disable-one-of-the-tabs">Forum topic</a></li>
<li>Added [accordion] scrolling. <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/accordion-usability-issue">Forum topic</a></li>
<li>Added wp_footer check. User will be noticed if current theme doen&#8217;t includes wp_footer</li>
<li>Updated caching mechanism. Cache will be reseted when you add or remove terms</li>
<li>Updated galleries mechanism. Removed some conflicts</li>
<li>Fixed spoiler background for style=fancy</li>
<li>Additional access check option for Shortcode Generator</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.1</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://gndev.info/shortcodes-ultimate/metro-skins/" rel="nofollow">5 metro skins</a></li>
<li>New screencast &#8211; <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kCWyO2F7jTw" rel="nofollow">How to create image gallery</a></li>
<li>New attribute &#8220;center&#8221; for [button]. Buttons can now be centered on the page</li>
<li>Updated [frame]. Now it can contain other shortcodes</li>
<li>Updated caching mechanism. Cache now will be reseted on plugin activation</li>
<li>Fixed many PHP warnings when debug mode enabled</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [media]. Shortcode has basic support for youtube and vimeo videos</li>
<li>Fixed bug with hidden single [tab]</li>
<li>Added attribute &#8220;active&#8221; for tabs container. This option allows you to select tab number that will be open by default</li>
<li>Fixd button style 3D</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [frame]</li>
<li>Fixed [column] margins</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [tabs]. Now it accepts style=3 and vertical attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [spoiler]. Now it accepts 0 and 1 as values for attribute open. Also, it now accepts style attribute (1, 2, default, fancy, simple)</li>
<li>Added custom CSS import from previous versions. Styles will be imported automatically and prepended to the existing CSS-code</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [highlight]. Now it accepts bg and background attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [label]. Now it accepts style and type attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [dropcap]. Now it accepts 1, 2 and 3 as style values</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [permalink]. Now it accepts p and id attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [button]. Need to test</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [members]. Now it accepts style and login attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [box]. Now it accepts color and box_color attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [note]. Now it accepts color and note_color attributes</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [column]. Now it accepts attribute last and can be not wrapped with [row]</li>
<li>Added backward compatibility for [document]. Now it accepts file and url attributes</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.0</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://gndev.info/shortcodes-ultimate/" rel="nofollow">Official plugin page</a></li>
<li><a href="http://gndev.info/shortcodes-ultimate/maker/" rel="nofollow">Premium add-on for creating custom shortcodes</a></li>
<li>Plugin based on <a href="https://github.com/gndev/sunrise" rel="nofollow">Sunrise Plugin Framework</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/gndev/shortcodes-ultimate" rel="nofollow">GitHub repo</a>. Now you can easily fork and modify best plugin in the world (:</li>
<li>Brand new Shortcode Generator, <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DR2c266yWEA" rel="nofollow">demo video</a></li>
<li><a href="http://gndev.info/kb/shortcodes-ultimate-api-overview/" rel="nofollow">Shortcodes API</a></li>
<li>Completely reorganized code. Added and removed some shortcodes</li>
<li>For security maniacs: timthumb.php replaced by native WordPress mechanism</li>
<li>For speed-up maniacs: completely rewritten assets mechanism. Now css and js files included on page depend on used shortcodes</li>
<li>Added new shortcode [posts]. This is awesome and flexible mechanism to display your content in many different ways</li>
<li>Now you can create your own custom skins for shortcodes</li>
<li>Columns, google maps, google document viewer, youtube player, vimeo player and custom audio player is now fully responsive</li>
</ul>

.zip";s:5:"5.2.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.2.0.zip";s:5:"5.3.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.3.0.zip";s:5:"5.4.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.4.0.zip";s:5:"5.4.1";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.4.1.zip";s:5:"5.5.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.5.0.zip";s:5:"5.6.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.6.0.zip";s:5:"5.6.1";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.5.6.1.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:62:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/shortcodes-ultimate.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:29:"https://paypal.me/anovladimir";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:72:"https://ps.w.org/shortcodes-ultimate/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1760590";s:2:"2x";s:72:"https://ps.w.org/shortcodes-ultimate/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1760590";}s:18:"author_block_count";i:0;s:19:"author_block_rating";i:98;s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:7:"markets";s:3:"any";s:8:"category";a:1:{s:3:"any";s:4:"more";}s:3:"new";i:1;}s:20:"fast-velocity-minify";a:31:{s:4:"name";s:20:"Fast Velocity Minify";s:4:"slug";s:20:"fast-velocity-minify";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.7.7";s:6:"author";s:50:"<a href="http://fastvelocity.com">Raul Peixoto</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:38:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/alignak";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.7";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.3.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:94;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:130;i:4;i:3;i:3;i:1;i:2;i:4;i:1;i:6;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:144;s:15:"support_threads";i:29;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:25;s:10:"downloaded";i:1561324;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2019-10-14 9:04pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2016-06-21";s:8:"homepage";s:23:"http://fastvelocity.com";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:3871:"<p>WP speed optimization plugin for developers and advanced users. This plugin reduces HTTP requests by merging CSS &amp; Javascript files into groups of files, while attempting to use the least amount of files as possible. It minifies CSS and JS files with PHP Minify (no extra requirements).</p>
<p>Minification is done on the frontend during the first uncached request. Once the first request is processed, any other pages that require the same set of CSS and JavaScript files, will be served that same (static) cache file.</p>
<p>This plugin includes options for developers and advanced users, however the default settings should work just fine for most sites.<br />
Kindly read our faqs about possible issues with you theme or specific plugins.</p>
<h4>Aditional Optimization</h4>
<p>I can offer you aditional <code>custom made</code> optimization on top of this plugin. If you would like to hire me, please visit my profile links for further information.</p>
<h4>Features</h4>
<ul>
<li>Merge JS and CSS files into groups to reduce the number of HTTP requests</li>
<li>Google Fonts merging, inlining and optimization</li>
<li>Handles scripts loaded both in the header &amp; footer separately</li>
<li>Keeps the order of the scripts even if you exclude some files from minification</li>
<li>Supports localized scripts (https://codex.wordpress.org/Function_Reference/wp_localize_script)</li>
<li>Minifies CSS and JS with PHP Minify only, no third party software or libraries needed.</li>
<li>Option to defer JavaScript and CSS files, either globally or pagespeed insights only.</li>
<li>Creates static cache files in the uploads directory.</li>
<li>Preserves your original files, by duplicating and copying those files to the uploads directory </li>
<li>View the status and detailed logs on the WordPress admin page.</li>
<li>Option to Minify HTML, remove extra info from the header and other optimizations.</li>
<li>Ability to turn off minification for JS, CSS or HTML (purge the cache to see it)</li>
<li>Ability to turn off CSS or JS merging completely (so you can debug which section causes conflicts and exclude the offending files)</li>
<li>Ability to manually ignore JavaScript or CSS files that conflict when merged together (please report if you find some)</li>
<li>Support for conditional scripts and styles, as well as inlined code that depends on the handles</li>
<li>Support for multisite installations (each site has its own settings)</li>
<li>Support for gzip_static on Nginx</li>
<li>Support for preconnect and preload headers</li>
<li>CDN option, to rewrite all static assets inside the JS or CSS files</li>
<li>WP CLI support to check stats and purge the cache</li>
<li>Auto purging of cache files for W3 Total Cache, WP Supercache, WP Rocket, Cachify, Comet Cache, Zen Cache, LiteSpeed Cache, Nginx Cache (by Till Krüss ), SG Optimizer, HyperCache, Cache Enabler, Breeze (Cloudways), Godaddy Managed WordPress Hosting and WP Engine (read the FAQs)</li>
<li>and some more&#8230;</li>
</ul>
<h4>WP-CLI Commands</h4>
<ul>
<li>Purge all caches: <code>wp fvm purge</code></li>
<li>Purge all caches on a network site: <code>wp --url=blog.example.com fvm purge</code></li>
<li>Purge all caches on the entire network (linux): <code>wp site list --field=url | xargs -n1 -I % wp --url=% fvm purge</code></li>
<li>Get cache size: <code>wp fvm stats</code></li>
<li>Get cache size on a network site: <code>wp --url=blog.example.com fvm stats</code></li>
<li>Get cache size on each site (linux): <code>wp site list --field=url | xargs -n1 -I % wp --url=% fvm stats</code></li>
</ul>
<h4>Notes</h4>
<ul>
<li>The JavaScript minification is by <a href="https://github.com/matthiasmullie/minify" rel="nofollow">PHP Minify</a></li>
<li>Compatible with Nginx, HHVM and PHP 7</li>
<li>Minimum requirements are PHP 5.5 and WP 4.4, from version 1.4.0 onwards</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:318:"<ol>
<li>Upload the plugin folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory or upload the zip within WordPress</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the <code>Plugins</code> menu in WordPress</li>
<li>Configure the options under: <code>Settings &gt; Fast Velocity Minify</code> and that&#8217;s it.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:14305:"
<h4>Can I update plugins and themes after installing FVM?</h4>
<p>
<p>FVM doesn&#8217;t touch your original files. It copies those files to the cache directory, minifies that copy and merges them together under a different name. If you install new plugins, change themes or do plugin updates, FVM will purge its cache as well as some of the most popular cache plugins.</p>
</p>
<h4>After installing, why did my site feels slow to load?</h4>
<p>
<p>Please see the question below.</p>
</p>
<h4>Why are there lots of JS and CSS files listed on the status page and why is the cache directory taking so much space?</h4>
<p>
<p>Some themes combine and enqueue their CSS using a PHP script with a query string that changes on every pageload&#8230; (this is to bust cache, but it&#8217;s bad practice since it prevents caching at all). When FVM sees a different url being enqueued, it will consider that as a new file and try to create a new set of files on every pageview as well. You must then exclude that dynamic url via the Ignore List on the settings for your cache to be efficient and stop growing. Also note, if your pages enqueue different styles or  javascript in different pages (fairly common), that is &#8220;one set&#8221; of files to be merged. Pay attention to the logs header and look for the page url where those files have ben generated. If you have multiple files generated for the same url, you have some css/js that keeps changing on every pageview (and thus needs exclusion).</p>
</p>
<h4>How can I exclude certain assets?</h4>
<p>
<p>Each line on the ignore list will try to match a substring against all CSS or JS files, for example <code>//yoursite.com/wp-content/plugins/some-plugin/js/</code> will ignore all files inside that directory. You can also shorten the URL like <code>/some-plugin/js/</code> and then it will match any css or js URL that has <code>/some-plugin/js/</code> on the path. Obviously, doing <code>/js/</code> would match any files inside any &#8220;/js/&#8221; directory and in any location, so to avoid unexpected situations please always use the longest, most specific path you can use. There is no need to use asterisks or regex code (it won&#8217;t work).</p>
</p>
<h4>Why is the ignore list not working?</h4>
<p>
<p>The ignore list &#8220;is&#8221; working, just try to use partial paths (see previous faq) and use relative urls only without any query vars.</p>
</p>
<h4>Is it compatible with other caching plugins?</h4>
<p>
<p>You must disable any features on your theme or cache plugins which perform minification of css, html and js. Double minification not only slows the whole process, but also has the high potential of causing conflicts in javascript. The plugin will try to automatically purge several popular cache plugins, however if you have a cache on the server side (some hosting services have this) you may need to purge it manually, after you purge FVM to see the results you expect. The automatic purge is active for the following plugins and hosting: W3 Total Cache, WP Supercache, WP Rocket, Cachify, Comet Cache, Zen Cache, LiteSpeed Cache, Cache Enabler, SG Optimizer, Breeze (Cloudways), Godaddy Managed WordPress Hosting and WP Engine</p>
</p>
<h4>Do you recommend a specific Cache Plugin?</h4>
<p>
<p>Currently we recommend the &#8220;Cache Enabler&#8221; plugin, for it&#8217;s simplicity, compatibility with most systems and performance. Alternatively, W3 Total Cache is a great choice as well.</p>
</p>
<h4>Is it resource intensive, or will it use too much CPU on my shared hosting plan?</h4>
<p>
<p>Unless you are not excluding dynamic CSS files that change the url in every pageload, its not heavy at all. On the first run, each single file is minified into an intermediate cache. When a new group of CSS/JS files is found on a new page, it reuses those files and merges them into a new static cache file. All pages that request the same group of CSS or JS files will also make use of that file, thus regeneration only happens once. In addition, gz and br files will be pre-compressed (if supported).</p>
</p>
<h4>How do I use the pre-compressed files with gzip_static or brotli_static on Nginx?</h4>
<p>
<p>When we merge and minify the css and js files, we also create a <code>.gz</code> file to be used with <code>gzip_static</code> on Nginx. You need to enable this feature on your Nginx configuration file if you want to make use of it. Likewise, if you have Nginx compiled with brotli and have enabled the php-ext-brotli extension for PHP, you can enable the brotli_static option and FVM will also generate .br files for you 🙂</p>
</p>
<h4>Is it compatible with multisites?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, it generates a new cache file for every different set of JS and CSS requirements it finds, but you must enable and configure FVM settings for each site in your network separatly (no global settings for all sites).</p>
</p>
<h4>Is it compatible with AdSense and other ad networks?</h4>
<p>
<p>If you are just inserting ads on your pages, yes. If you are using a custom script to inject those ads, please double check if it works.</p>
</p>
<h4>After installing, why are some images, sections, sliders, galleries, menus (etc) not working?</h4>
<p>
<p>a) You cannot do double minification, so make sure you have disabled any features on your theme or other plugins that perform minification of css, html and js files.</p>
<p>b) If you enabled the option to defer JS or CSS, please note that some themes and plugins need jQuery and other libraries to be render blocking. If you enable the option to defer, any javascript code on the page will trigger an &#8220;undefined&#8221; error on the google chrome console log after page load.</p>
<p>c) The plugin relies on PHP Minify to minify JavaScript and css files, however it is not a perfect library and there are plugins that are already minified and do not output a &#8220;min.js&#8221; or &#8220;min.css&#8221; filename (and end up being minified again). Try to disable minification on JS and CSS files and purge the cache, then either dequeue it and enqueue an alternative file or add it to the ignore list.</p>
<p>d) Sometimes a plugin conflicts with another when merged (look at google chrome console log for hints). Try to disable CSS processing first and see if it works. Disable JS processing second and see if it works. Try to disable HTML minification last and see if it works. If one of those work, you know there is a conflict when merging/minifying.</p>
<p>e) If you have a conflict, try to add each CSS and each JS file to the ignore list one by one, until you find the one that causes the conflict. If you have no idea of which files to add, check the log file on the &#8220;status page&#8221; for a list of files being merged into each generated file.</p>
<p>f) If you coded some inline JS code that depends on a JS file being loaded before it&#8217;s execution (render blocking), try to save that code into an external file and enqueue it as a dependency. It will be merged together and run after the other file, thus no longer being &#8220;undefined&#8221;.</p>
</p>
<h4>Why are some of the CSS and JS files not being merged?</h4>
<p>
<p>The plugin only processes JS and CSS files enqueued using the official WordPress api method &#8211; https://developer.wordpress.org/themes/basics/including-css-javascript/ -as well as files from the same domain (unless specified on the settings).</p>
</p>
<h4>Can I merge files from other domains?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes and no. You can for example, merge js files such as jQuery if they are loading from a CDN and it will work, because it doesn&#8217;t matter where those files are being served from. However, stuff like Facebook and other social media widgets, as well as tracking codes, widgets and so on, cannot usually be merged and cached locally as they may load something different on every pageload, or anytime they change something. Ads and widgets make your site slow, so make sure you only use the minimum necessary plugins and widgets.</p>
</p>
<h4>How to undo all changes done by the plugin?</h4>
<p>
<p>The plugin itself does not do any &#8220;changes&#8221; to your site and all original files are untouched. It intercepts the enqueued CSS and JS files just before printing your HTML, copies them and enqueues the newly optimized cached version of those files to the frontend. As with any plugin&#8230; simply disable or uninstall the plugin, purge all caches you may have in use (plugins, server, cloudflare, etc.) and the site will go back to what it was before installing it. The plugin does not delete anything from the database or modify any of your files.</p>
</p>
<h4>I have disabled or deleted the plugin but my design is still broken!</h4>
<p>
<p>Some &#8220;cheap&#8221; (or sometimes expensive) &#8220;optimized&#8221; hosting providers, implement a (misconfigured) aggressive cache on their servers that caches PHP code execution and PHP files. I&#8217;ve seen people completely deleting all WordPress files from their host via SFTP/FTP and the website kept working fine for hours. Furthermore, very often they rate limit your cache purge requests&#8230; so if you delete FVM and are still seeing references to FVM files on the &#8220;view-source:https://example.com&#8221; please be patient and contact your web hosting to purge all caches. Providers known to have this issue are some plans on hostgator and iPage (please report others if you find them).</p>
</p>
<h4>Why is my Visual Composer or Page Editor not working?</h4>
<p>
<p>Some plugins and themes need to edit the layout and styles on the frontend. If you have trouble with page editors, please enable the &#8220;Fix Page Editors&#8221; option on FVM and purge your caches. Note: You will only see the FVM minification working when you&#8217;re logged out or using another browser after this setting.</p>
</p>
<h4>What are the recommended cloudflare settings for this plugin?</h4>
<p>
<p>On the &#8220;Speed&#8221; tab, deselect the Auto Minify for JavaScript, CSS and HTML as well as the Rocket Loader option as there is no benefit of using them with our plugin (we already minify things). Those options can also break the design due to double minification or the fact that the Rocket Loader is still experimental (you can read about that on the &#8220;Help&#8221; link under each selected option on cloudflare).</p>
</p>
<h4>How can I load CSS async?</h4>
<p>
<p>You are probably a developer if you are trying this. The answer is: make sure FVM is only generating 1 CSS file, because &#8220;async&#8221; means multiple files will load out of order (however CSS needs order most of the times). If FVM is generating more than 1 CSS file per mediatype, try to manually dequeue some of the CSS files that are breaking the series on FVM (such as external enqueued files), or add their domain to the settings to be merged together. Please note&#8230; this is an advanced option for skilled developers. Do not try to fiddle with these settings if you are not one, as it will almost certainly break your site layout and functionality.</p>
</p>
<h4>Why is FVM using defer instead of async javascript?</h4>
<p>
<p>The answer is simple. For compatibility reasons and to avoid some undefined javascript errors, we need to preserve the order of scripts. Async means that any js files will load in parallel without waiting for each other or without following a specific order. If FVM generates multiple JS files for your site, using Async could cause footer scripts to load before the header scripts in an inconsistent manner. By using defer, we make sure the scripts load in order, as defined by each plugin and theme developer.<br />
Your ads or scripts wich are already specifically async will continue to be so, unless you specifically mark them to be merged as well.</p>
</p>
<h4>I have a complaint or I need support right now.</h4>
<p>
<p>Before getting angry because you have no answer within a few hours (even with paid plugins, sometimes it takes weeks&#8230;), please be informed about how wordpress.org and the plugins directory work. The plugins directory is an open source, free service where developers and programmers contribute (on their free time) with plugins that can be downloaded and installed by anyone &#8220;at their own risk&#8221; and are all released under the GPL license. While all plugins have to be approved and reviewed by the WordPress team before being published (for dangerous code, spam, etc.) this does not change the license or add any warranty. All plugins are provided as they are, free of charge and should be used at your own risk (so you should make backups before installing any plugin or performing updates) and it is your sole responsibility if you break your site after installing a plugin from the plugins directory. For a full version of the license, please read: https://wordpress.org/about/gpl/</p>
</p>
<h4>Why haven&#8217;t you replied to my topic on the support forum yet?</h4>
<p>
<p>Support is provided by plugin authors on their free time and without warranty of a reply, so you can experience different levels of support level from plugin to plugin. As the author of this plugin I strive to provide support on a daily basis and I can take a look and help you with some issues related with my plugin, but please note that this is done out of my goodwill and in no way I have any legal or moral obligation for doing this. Sometimes I am extremely busy and may take a few days to reply, but I will always reply.</p>
</p>
<h4>But I really need fast support right now, is there any other way?</h4>
<p>
<p>I am also available for hiring if you need custom-made speed optimizations. After you have installed the plugin, check the &#8220;Help&#8221; tab for contact information, or check my profile links here on WordPress.</p>
</p>
<h4>Where can I report bugs?</h4>
<p>
<p>You can get support on the official WordPress plugin page at https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/fast-velocity-minify<br />
Alternatively, you can reach me via info (at) fastvelocity.com for security or other vulnerabilities.</p>
</p>
<h4>How can I donate to the plugin author?</h4>
<p>
<p>If you would like to donate any amount to the plugin author (thank you in advance), you can do it via PayPal at https://goo.gl/vpLrSV</p>
</p>

Podcast Publisher";s:4:"slug";s:39:"podlove-podcasting-plugin-for-wordpress";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.9.6";s:6:"author";s:40:"<a href="http://podlove.org">Podlove</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:39:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/eteubert";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.4";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.3.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.4";s:6:"rating";i:92;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:30;i:4;i:1;i:3;i:1;i:2;i:0;i:1;i:3;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:35;s:15:"support_threads";i:1;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:0;s:10:"downloaded";i:181248;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2019-11-14 8:14pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2012-06-26";s:8:"homepage";s:28:"http://publisher.podlove.org";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:3419:"<p>We built the Podlove Podcast Publisher because existing solutions are stuck in the past, complex and unwieldy. The Publisher helps you save time, worry less and provides a cutting edge listening experience for your audience.</p>
<p>Official Site: <a href="http://publisher.podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">publisher.podlove.org</a></p>
<h4>Video Tutorial: Getting started with Podlove Publisher</h4>
<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class='youtube-player' type='text/html' width='640' height='360' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/Hmrm-jUe6u4?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;fs=1&#038;autohide=2&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;wmode=transparent' allowfullscreen='true' style='border:0;'></iframe></span>
<h4>Compatible Feeds</h4>
<p>The Publisher makes it easy to create highly expressive, efficient and super compatible podcast feeds with fine grained control over client behavior (e.g. GUID control to replace faulty episodes and for clients to reload) supporting all important meta data.</p>
<h4>Multi-Format Publishing</h4>
<p>The Publisher also makes multi-format publishing &#8211; embracing all modern and legacy audio and video codecs &#8211; a snap. By adopting simple file name conventions, the plugin allows the podcaster to provide individual feeds for certain use cases or audiences without adding work for the podcaster during the publishing process.</p>
<h4>Optimized Web Player</h4>
<p>The Publisher also comes with integrated with the Podlove Web Player plugin (which you do not need to install separately) and fully support its advanced options including multiple audio (MP4 AAC, MP3, Vorbis, Opus) and video (MP4 H.264, WebM, Theora) format support for web browsers. This Web Player is fully HTML5 compatible (but provides Flash fallback for ancient environments) and is ready for all touch based clients too.</p>
<h4>Chapter Support</h4>
<p>The Publisher also makes it easy to publish chapter information in the player to make access to structured episodes even easier. Full support for linking directly to any part of your podcast on the web with instant playback included.</p>
<h4>Flexible Templates</h4>
<p>To round it all up, a flexible template system enables you to published Podcasts in a defined fashion and change the style at any time without having to touch your individual postings later on.</p>
<p>And this is just the beginning. We have a rich roadmap that will bring even more interesting features: integration with helpful services, much improved timeline metadata support (show notes) and much more.</p>
<h4>Further Reading</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://publisher.podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Podlove Publisher</a></li>
<li><a href="http://podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Podlove Project</a></li>
<li><a href="https://community.podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Podlove Community</a></li>
<li><a href="http://docs.podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Documentation</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues" rel="nofollow">Bug Tracker</a></li>
<li><a href="http://podlove.org/donations/" rel="nofollow">Donate</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Development of the plugin is an open process. The current version is available <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher" rel="nofollow">on GitHub</a> Feel free to contribute and to fix errors or send improvements via GitHub.</p>
<p>Requires PHP 5.4+</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:410:"<ol>
<li>Download the Podlove Publisher Plugin to your desktop.</li>
<li>If downloaded as a zip archive, extract the Plugin folder to your desktop.</li>
<li>With your FTP program, upload the Plugin folder to the wp-content/plugins folder in your WordPress directory online.</li>
<li>Go to Plugins screen and find the newly uploaded Plugin in the list.</li>
<li>Click Activate Plugin to activate it.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:2238:"
<h4>Is Podlove Podcast Publisher free?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes! The core features of Podlove Podcast Publisher are and always will be free. <a href="https://publisher.podlove.org/support/" rel="nofollow">Paid Professional Support</a> is available but not necessary to run the plugin.</p>
</p>
<h4>Are there Download Statistics?</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes! Podcast Downloads can be tracked and analyzed. You can easily see how many people downloaded you podcast episodes, which clients they used, if they prefer to subscribe to the feed or listen on your website using the web player—and much more.</p>
</p>
<h4>Are there Privacy / GDPR considerations?</h4>
<p>
<p>Podlove Publisher is GDPR compliant and provides prewritten text snippets for your privacy page. See https://docs.podlove.org/podlove-publisher/guides/dsgvo-gdpr.html</p>
</p>
<h4>Where can I host my podcast files?</h4>
<p>
<p>Any storage where you have control over the file naming is compatible with Podlove Podcast Publisher. You can manage files using a simple FTP/sFTP or use services like Amazon S3.</p>
</p>
<h4>Where can I ask questions and get support?</h4>
<p>
<p>Free support where questions are answered by the community is available in the <a href="http://community.podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Podlove Community Forum</a>. There is a German community in the <a href="https://sendegate.de/" rel="nofollow">Sendegate</a>. <a href="http://publisher.podlove.org/support" rel="nofollow">Professional Support</a> by the plugin developer is also available.</p>
</p>
<h4>How can I help the project?</h4>
<p>
<p>The continued success of Open Source project relies on the community. There are many ways you can help:</p>
<ul>
<li>If you enjoy the plugin, please <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/podlove-podcasting-plugin-for-wordpress/reviews/#new-post">leave a review</a>.</li>
<li>You can answer questions of other fellow podcasters in the <a href="https://community.podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Podlove Community</a>.</li>
<li>You can buy <a href="https://publisher.podlove.org/support/" rel="nofollow">Support</a> to financially support the project.</li>
</ul>
<p>This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from http://www.maxmind.com.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:8233:"<h4>2.9.6</h4>
<ul>
<li>update PHP dependencies (including User Agent library for download analytics)</li>
<li>add: expose voice attribute to transcript templates (<a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/pull/1062" rel="nofollow">#1062</a>)</li>
<li>add(templating): add sort direction in seasons and season episodes, enabling <code>podcast.seasons({order: 'DESC'})</code> and <code>season.episode({order: 'DESC'})</code> (<a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1080" rel="nofollow">#1080</a>)</li>
<li>fix: download list description in analytics on mobile (<a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1056" rel="nofollow">#1056</a>)</li>
<li>fix: JS issue when selecting transcript voices</li>
<li>fix: escaping error in contributor comments (<a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1081" rel="nofollow">#1081</a>)</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.9.5</h4>
<ul>
<li>Slacknotes: reactivate date picker</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.9.4</h4>
<ul>
<li>fix: error on &#8220;file types&#8221; settings page</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>IAB Conformity</strong></p>
<p>When it comes to tracking download intents, Podlove Publisher was always close to IAB recommendations, with one exception: the time window in which two requests count as two. Podlove Publisher deduplicates by hour, IAB recommends a day.</p>
<p>There is a new setting in <code>Podlove &gt; Expert Settings &gt; Tracking</code>: &#8220;Deduplication Window&#8221;. It enables you to change the window to &#8220;day&#8221;. This is an opt-in setting, the default will continue to be hourly.</p>
<p>See also: <a href="https://docs.podlove.org/podlove-publisher/guides/download-analytics.html#iab-conformity" rel="nofollow">docs.podlove.org: IAB Conformity</a></p>
<p>This feature is sponsored by <a href="https://lagedernation.org" rel="nofollow">Lage der Nation</a>.</p>
<h4>2.9.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>add quick edit for episode number <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/pull/1069" rel="nofollow">#1096</a></li>
<li>fix settings tab issues when using a language in WordPress other than english (<a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/commit/e613e99bb4f07bb88234146567e76d21ce06f5ff" rel="nofollow">e613e99</a>)</li>
<li>fix issue with category search / pages</li>
<li>fix auphonic module issue in Gutenberg editor</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.9.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>update Podlove Web Player (fixes issue when sharing/embedding the player)</li>
<li>fix PHP notices <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1066" rel="nofollow">#1066</a> <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1064" rel="nofollow">#1064</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>2.9.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>fix web player sharing when using CDN player</li>
<li>fix duplicating posts: create new guid; do not copy analytics <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1048" rel="nofollow">#1048</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>2.9.0</h4>
<p><strong>New Apple iTunes Categories</strong></p>
<p>Apple updated their list of available iTunes categories.<br />
Please check in <code>Podlove &gt; Podcast Settings &gt; Directory &gt; iTunes Category</code> if you need or want to update your category.<br />
In case your previously selected category does not exist any more, a warning is shown.</p>
<p>Only one category is selectable now (instead of previously 3) to conform with iTunes specifications.</p>
<p><strong>Download tracking with Google Analytics</strong></p>
<p>Set your Google Analytics Tracking ID in Podlove &gt; Expert Settings &gt; Tracking.<br />
Then every download intent will be forwarded to Google Analytics.</p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/pull/1058" rel="nofollow">#1058</a></p>
<p><strong>Other</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>fix: check if podlovePlayer function is available before calling it <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/pull/1060" rel="nofollow">#1060</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>2.8.10</h4>
<ul>
<li>update Podlove Web Player 4 to latest version</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.8.9</h4>
<ul>
<li>update Podlove Web Player 4 to latest version</li>
<li>remove PHP dependency leth/ip-address</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.8.8</h4>
<ul>
<li>update Podlove Web Player 4 to latest version</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.8.7</h4>
<ul>
<li>update Podlove Web Player 4 to latest version</li>
<li>add player setting to either use the podcast language or user&#8217;s browser language for web player interface (<a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/pull/1008" rel="nofollow">#1008</a>)</li>
<li>fix <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/issues/1047" rel="nofollow">#1047 Use of PHP 5.6 feature in Shows module</a></li>
<li>report duplicate guids in system report</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.8.0</h4>
<p><strong>Transcripts</strong></p>
<p>“Transcripts” is the new module to manage transcripts, show them on your site and in the web player. You can import them from webvtt files. If you are already using the Podlove Publisher contributors, you can assign people to the voices inside the webvtt. Then you even get avatars automatically in your transcripts.</p>
<p>See <a href="https://forschergeist.de/podcast/fg066-klimaneutralitaet/" rel="nofollow">https://forschergeist.de/podcast/fg066-klimaneutralitaet/</a> for an example episode with transcripts in the web player.</p>
<p><strong>Transcripts: Shortcode</strong></p>
<p>The shortcode <code>[podlove-transcript]</code> displays a pretty html version of the transcript for your website.</p>
<p><strong>Transcripts: Twig Template Support</strong></p>
<p>Of course there is a fully featured template API for transcripts as well. For example:</p>
<p>{% for group in episode.transcript %}</p>
<p>            {{ group.contributor.image.html({width: 50}) }}</p>
<p>                {{ group.contributor.name }}</p>
<p>                {% for line in group.items %}<br />
                {{ line.content }}<br />
                {% endfor %}</p>
<p>{% endfor %}</p>
<p>See <a href="https://docs.podlove.org/podlove-publisher/reference/template-tags.html" title="documentation" rel="nofollow">https://docs.podlove.org/podlove-publisher/reference/template-tags.html</a> for all details.</p>
<p><strong>Global Podcast Analytics</strong></p>
<p>The following metrics are now available for the whole podcast:</p>
<ul>
<li>downloads per month</li>
<li>top episodes</li>
<li>episode asset</li>
<li>podcast client</li>
<li>operating system</li>
<li>download source</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Raw Analytics</strong></p>
<p>I wouldn’t call this an Analytics API but since it exists to power the analytics screen, I might as well document it. The following endpoints return results in CSV format for easy processing or import to spreadsheets.</p>
<p>Here is an example call that returns the number of downloads in March 2019:</p>
<pre><code>https://your.domain/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=podlove-analytics-global-downloads-per-month&amp;date_from=2019-03-01T00:00:00.000Z&amp;date_to=2019-03-31T23:59:59.999Z
</code></pre>
<p>All requests take the same three parameters:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>action</code> defines what data you want</li>
<li><code>date_from</code> is the start date in ISO 8601</li>
<li><code>date_end</code> is the end date in ISO 8601</li>
</ul>
<p>Available actions are:</p>
<ul>
<li>podlove-analytics-global-downloads-per-month</li>
<li>podlove-analytics-global-top-episodes</li>
<li>podlove-analytics-global-assets</li>
<li>podlove-analytics-global-clients</li>
<li>podlove-analytics-global-systems</li>
<li>podlove-analytics-global-sources</li>
</ul>
<p>You need to be logged in with admin permissions for the requests to work.</p>
<p>Disclaimer: Depending on the popularity of your podcast and chosen date range, the requests may take a long time to respond, or even fail if the calculation takes longer than the timeout defined in your web server.</p>
<p><strong>Other</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>background jobs: add button to abort job</li>
<li>new tab style for chapter marks section</li>
<li>Podlove Web Player 4 fallback for old browsers and disabled JavaScript</li>
</ul>
<p>Changes for previous versions can be found in the <a href="https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher/blob/master/changelog.txt" rel="nofollow"><code>changelog.txt</code></a>.</p>

Web Player";s:4:"slug";s:18:"podlove-web-player";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.1.0";s:6:"author";s:46:"<a href="http://podlove.org/">Podlove Team</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:45:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/gerritvanaaken";s:8:"requires";s:5:"3.4.0";s:6:"tested";s:6:"4.6.17";s:12:"requires_php";b:0;s:6:"rating";i:60;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:3;i:4;i:0;i:3;i:1;i:2;i:0;i:1;i:3;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:7;s:15:"support_threads";i:1;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:0;s:10:"downloaded";i:34158;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2016-10-20 2:22pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2012-07-03";s:8:"homepage";s:38:"http://podlove.org/podlove-web-player/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:2371:"<p>This is part of the “Podlove” initiative for a better podcasting experience. See <a href="http://podlove.org" rel="nofollow">podlove.org</a> for more information.</p>
<p>There are basically four ways to use the Podlove Web Player:</p>
<h3>1) as a Standalone Player</h3>
<p>You won’t need any of the PHP or WordPress files in this package. Just stick to &#8220;standalone.html&#8221; and see how it’s done there. Maybe you want to build your very own CMS plugin. If so – let us know!</p>
<h3>2) manual WordPress shortcodes</h3>
<p>Use a simple shortcode in your posts and pages, and the Podlove Web Player will appear, playing any media file you want to assign. Basic usage:</p>
<p>[podloveaudio src=&#8221;http://mysite.com/mymedia.mp3&#8243; duration=&#8221;03:33&#8243; title=&#8221;My track&#8221;]</p>
<h3>3) WordPress enclosures</h3>
<p>The WordPress plugin searches for media enclosures in your existing posts and renders a web player automatically. Works like a charme, even for Blubrry PowerPress users.</p>
<h3>4) as part of the Podlove Podcast Publisher</h3>
<p>This player is bundled with the <a href="http://podlove.org/podlove-podcast-publisher" rel="nofollow">“PPP” project</a> and should be automatically rendered, so you don’t have to worry about anything.</p>
<h3>Credits</h3>
<p>The Podlove Web Player is built from the <a href="http://podlove.org/" rel="nofollow">Podlove Team</a>.</p>
<p>It uses sources from <a href="http://mediaelementjs.com/" rel="nofollow">MediaElement.js</a>, <a href="http://jquery.com/" rel="nofollow">jQuery</a> and <a href="http://benalman.com/projects/jquery-hashchange-plugin/" rel="nofollow">jQuery hashchange event</a>.</p>
<p>The used icons are built in as fonts and provided by <a href="http://fortawesome.github.com/Font-Awesome/" rel="nofollow">Font Awesome</a>, <a href="http://zocial.smcllns.com/" rel="nofollow">Zocial</a>, <a href="http://somerandomdude.com/work/iconic/" rel="nofollow">Iconic</a>, <a href="http://aristeides.com/" rel="nofollow">Elusive</a>, <a href="http://designmodo.com/linecons-free/" rel="nofollow">Linecons</a>, <a href="http://www.entypo.com" rel="nofollow">Entypo</a>, <a href="http://www.justbenicestudio.com/studio/websymbols/" rel="nofollow">Web Symbols</a>, <a href="http://thedesignoffice.org/project/modern-pictograms/" rel="nofollow">Modern Pictograms</a>.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:496:"<ol>
<li>Upload the <code>podlove-web-player</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the <code>Plugins</code> menu in WordPress</li>
<li>Use the <code>[podlovevideo]</code> or <code>[podloveaudio]</code> shortcode in your post or page with the options on the front page</li>
<li>Visit the options page</li>
<li>If you need help, go to the github repo https://github.com/podlove/podlove-web-player and use the issue tracker</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:6361:"
<h4>Where can i get help?</h4>
<p>
<p>Definitely not on wordpress.org<br />
If you need help, please go to our github repo<br />
You can find it at https://github.com/podlove/podlove-web-player</p>
</p>
<h4>How can I configure the player’s appearance?</h4>
<p>
<p>Just use the shortcode options that are described on this FAQ page!</p>
</p>
<h4>src</h4>
<p>
<p>This location of any audio or video file, local ore remote:</p>
<pre><code>[podloveaudio src="http://mysite.com/mymedia.mp3"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>type</h4>
<p>
<p>The media type of the resource:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo src="http://mysite.com/mymedia.m4v" type="video/mp4"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>mp4 / webm / ogg</h4>
<p>
<p>The location of a file with a specific video type:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo mp4="mymedia.mp4" webm="mymedia.webm" ogg="mymedia.ogv"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>mp4 / mp3 / ogg / opus</h4>
<p>
<p>[podloveaudio mp4=&#8221;mymedia.m4a&#8221; mp3=&#8221;mymedia.mp3&#8243; ogg=&#8221;mymedia.oga&#8221; opus=&#8221;mymedia.opus&#8221;]</p>
</p>
<h4>poster</h4>
<p>
<p>The location of the poster frame for the video (or cover image for the rich audio player):</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo poster="http://mysite.com/mymedia.png"]
[podloveaudio poster="http://mysite.com/mymedia.png"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>width / height</h4>
<p>
<p>The width and/or height of the video (or the audio player):</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo width="640" height="264"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>loop</h4>
<p>
<p>Loops the video or audio when it ends:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo src="http://mysite.com/mymedia.mp4" loop="true"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>preload</h4>
<p>
<p>Start loading the video as soon as possible, before the user clicks play. This might not work on all browsers.</p>
<pre><code>[podloveaudio preload="true"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>autoplay</h4>
<p>
<p>Start playing the video as soon as it&#8217;s ready. This might not work on all (mobile) devices.</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo autoplay="true"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>fullscreen</h4>
<p>
<p>Disables the fullscreen button for video:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo fullscreen="false"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>duration</h4>
<p>
<p>Enables display of duration without having to load the media file. Use seconds or timecode as a unit:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo duration="3522"]
[podloveaudio duration="00:58:42"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>alwaysShowHours</h4>
<p>
<p>Displays the time in 00:00:00 instead of 00:00. Default is &#8220;true&#8221;.</p>
<pre><code>[podloveaudio alwaysShowHours="false"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>alwaysShowControls</h4>
<p>
<p>Defines whether the player control bar is permanently visible. For videos, it might be suitable to fade the controls out when not hovering the video.</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo alwaysShowControls="false"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>volume</h4>
<p>
<p>Disables the volume slider:</p>
<pre><code>[podloveaudio volume="false"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>progress</h4>
<p>
<p>Disables the progress bar:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo progress="false"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>captions</h4>
<p>
<p>URL to a WebVTT captions file:</p>
<pre><code>[podlovevideo captions="http://mysite.com/mymedia.vtt"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>chapters</h4>
<p>
<p>Takes chapter json string from the defined custom field (the standard WordPress ones) and builds an interactive chapter table. Can be referenced to an external json file, too. Chapters must be written in the following format:</p>
<p>[{<br />
  &#8220;start&#8221;: &#8220;00:00:00&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;title&#8221;: &#8220;foo&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;href&#8221;: &#8220;http://podlove.org&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;image&#8221;:&#8221;&#8221;<br />
},{<br />
  &#8220;start&#8221;: &#8220;00:01:00&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;title&#8221;: &#8220;lorem&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;href&#8221;: &#8220;https://github.com/podlove/&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;image&#8221;:&#8221;samples/coverimage-red.png&#8221;<br />
},{<br />
  &#8220;start&#8221;: &#8220;00:02:30&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;title&#8221;: &#8220;ipsum&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;href&#8221;: &#8220;https://github.com/shownotes/&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;image&#8221;:&#8221;samples/coverimage-green.png&#8221;<br />
},{<br />
  &#8220;start&#8221;: &#8220;00:03:00&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;title&#8221;: &#8220;end&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;href&#8221;: &#8220;&#8221;,<br />
  &#8220;image&#8221;:&#8221;samples/coverimage-blue.png&#8221;<br />
}]</p>
<ul>
<li>&#8220;start&#8221; has to be defined as HH:MM:SS</li>
<li>&#8220;title&#8221; is the name of the chapter</li>
<li>&#8220;href&#8221; is an optional URL</li>
<li>
<p>&#8220;image&#8221; is an optional image URL or relative path</p>
<p>[podloveaudio chapters=&#8221;my_chapter_field&#8221;]<br />
[podloveaudio chapters=&#8221;http://mychapters.com/chapters.json&#8221;]</p>
</li>
</ul>
</p>
<h4>chaptersVisible / timecontrolsVisible / summaryVisible</h4>
<p>
<p>Defines the default visibility status of toggable player modules. Standard value is &#8220;false&#8221;.</p>
<pre><code>[podloveaudio chaptersVisible="true" timecontrolsVisible="false" summaryVisible="false"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>Rich Podlove Web Player player with meta information</h4>
<p>
<p>If you have an audio file and use one of the following attributes, the player will sport a richer visual experience: &#8220;title&#8221;, &#8220;subtitle&#8221;, &#8220;summary&#8221;, &#8220;poster&#8221;, &#8220;permalink&#8221;. Full example:</p>
<pre><code>[podloveaudio mp3="http://mysite.com/mymedia.mp3" ogg="http://mysite.com/mymedia.ogg" title="PWP – First show" subtitle="We talk about this and that" summary="Here goes a summary of the episode which should be about 256 characters long" poster="http://mysite.com/mymedia.jpg" chapters="my_chapter_field" permalink="http://mysite.com/my-first-episode/"]
</code></pre>
</p>
<h4>Podlove Web Player Shortcode in multiple lines</h4>
<p>
<p>Don&#8217;t do it, always write the shortcode in a single line.</p>
</p>
<h4>Deprecated usage</h4>
<p>
<p>Chapters now handed over as JSON, please take a look at the standalone.html. The previous solution will still work, however we recommend to use the new solution, as it offers some more features.<br />
Earlier versions of this plugin could handle alternative shortcodes, too: [audio] and [video]. As of version 1.1, these are deprecated as they conflict with other plugins.</p>
</p>
